descriptionHTML:
YOU NEED TO INSTALL WATCHMAKER PREMIUM TO USE THIS WATCH FACE Download it here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

Opulence OP1.2 free watch face

Features:
New camo texture the color can be change
Clean and crisp original design
21 colors for the blue elements
Glow mode
Dimmed mode
Dual time
Day, date
Watch and phone battery levels
Animated Transitions.

Usage:
Tap on the day to cycle 21 colors for the blue elements on the Watch face
Tap on the Power levels indicator to set up Glow mode on Sunset or manual.
Tap on the dual time dial to activate camo mode.

More to come...

For Android Wear
comments: 5 for your work. I LOVE your work. Your faces are amazing and elegant. I have to say that this face is far too tiny on the LG G Watch. I can barely read it. I know you mainly do round faces. That doesn't make your work any less. You are by far one of the best. I just wish you would extend out to more square faces. If you'd be so kind to edit this from a round inside a square face to a true square face it would be much appreciated. Keep up the great work. You're a true artist!
Great Work Really love ur work man. Amazing just make the small Number Markers Square too. Thanks dude
Not able to see on my moto 360 sport Not able to see on my watch
Cool watch face Thanks for giving the square heads some love. Looks really good
Looks nice shall give it a whirl
